description: List of incoming and old memories with their dialogs

happyMemory.description: The snow fell for the first time this year. I caught a snowflake on my hand. It melted into my skin instantly.

sadMemory.description: I hummed to an old song. I tried to remember how I knew the song but the memory kept escaping me. Still, it soothed me and I kept humming it.

happyMemory.description: I bumped into an old high school friend on the bus. We spoke for a bit. He seemed to be doing well.

sadMemory.description: I got a new high score in Silly Goose. It took me two weeks to beat it. Finally. Such an accomplishment.

happyMemory.description: I completed my 1h workout on the treadmill â€” felt amazing after!

sadMemory.description: I got a 38% on my midterm. They were mostly silly mistakes.

happyMemory.description: I found a rare collectible card that sells on ebay for $7000. I hid it in a box under my bed and can't wait for its value to go up so I can sell it.

sadMemory.description: I made a scrumptious breakfast: waffles toppled with a mountain of strawberries, blueberries, bananas, and chocolate syrup. Wished someone could enjoy it with me.

happyMemory.description: I took a selfie with my best friend on the Ferris wheel. I looked great in the picture. We look like we were having a blast.

sadMemory.description: I dropped my phone in a puddle and it didn't turn back on. Tried putting it in rice. Still didn't turn on. Bummer.

happyMemory.description: I built a snow fort with my brother Zai. Then we had a snowball contest to see whose fort gets destroyed first. Nobody won because our forts were too strong.

sadMemory.description: I was studying at midnight. Daddy came in my room and told me not to sleep so late. I was annoyed.

happyMemory.description: Daddy played indoor soccer with me and my brother Zai. I kicked the ball too hard and knocked over a vase. Mommmy got mad.

sadMemory.description: Daddy played music in the car and he sang really loudly. He sang louder than the music.

happyMemory.description: At recess, I fell while playing tag with my friends and scraped my knees and hands. My teacher put some band-aids on the booboo and they felt better.

sadMemory.description: After school, Zai and I lied on the floor of the living room and played Mario Kart. We played until Mommy called us for supper.

happyMemory.description: Under the sunlight, I saw some dust floating in the air. They looked like fairies. I tried to catch them in my hands. They disappeared every time.

sadMemory.description: In the car, I told Daddy and Mommy that the moon is following us. They both laughed and didn't take me seriously.

happyMemory.description: At the candy store, I wanted to be an adult so I paid the cashier with my own coins from my piggy bank. I was proud of myself.

sadMemory.description: Daddy brought me and Zai on a Ferris wheel. We were really high up. I was scared but Daddy was with me so it was not so scary. Mommy waved hello down below and we waved back.

happyMemory.description: I made a Father's Day card in kindergarden. I spelled 'Dadi' incorrecly but my teacher didn't tell me until I finished.

sadMemory.description: In the water park, Daddy helped me hop over a humongous wave. The water was freezing. I still had a lot of fun.

happyMemory.description: Mommy and Daddy put me in a unicorn costume for Halloween. I didn't stop crying so Daddy stayed with me in daycare until I stopped crying.

sadMemory.description: Daddy taught me how to make bao. I pretended to be a chef. We made a mess in the kitchen.

oldMemories.previewVideoTitle: I made a card in kindergarden.

incomingMemories.previewVideoTitle: I posted a salad pic on Instagram

dialogs.speaker: Daddy
dialogs.dialog: Ok. Lu, give your brother a chance to kick the ball.
